languages.text: {n}Блеф игнорирует арбитра, его взгляд прикован к Мейв — точнее, к колье на ее груди.{/n} "Милая вещица, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Блеф игнорирует Арбитеса, его взгляд прикован к Мейв — точнее, к колье на ее груди.{/n} "Милая вещица, не правда ли?"

languages.text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"
languages.original_text: {n}Блеф игнорирует арбитра, его взгляд прикован к Мейв — точнее, к колье на ее груди.{/n} "Милая вещица, не правда ли?"

{n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

languages.text: {n}闹闹没有理会索罗蒙的咆哮。他的目光紧紧盯着梅芙，或者更确切地说，是盯着她胸前的项链。{/n}“真是条可爱的项链，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}闹闹没有理会索罗蒙的咆哮。他的目光紧紧盯着梅芙，或者更确切地说，是盯着她胸前的项链。{/n}“真是条可爱的项链，你说呢？”

languages.text: {n}Farol ignora al Arbitrator; tiene la mirada fija en Maive, concretamente en el collar que cuelga sobre su pecho.{/n} «Una baratija la mar de mona, ¿verdad que sí?».
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Farol ignora al Arbitrator; tiene la mirada fija en Maive, concretamente en el collar que cuelga sobre su pecho.{/n} «Una baratija la mar de mona, ¿verdad que sí?».

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarını Maive'den, daha doğrusu göğsündeki kolyeden ayırmaya Kurusıkı; Yargıcı'yı görmezden geliyor.{/n} "Hoş bir parça, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarını Maive'den, daha doğrusu göğsündeki kolyeden ayırmaya Kurusıkı; Yargıcı'yı görmezden geliyor.{/n} "Hoş bir parça, değil mi?"

languages.text: {n}ブラフはアービトレイターを無視し、彼の視線はメイヴに―具体的には、彼女の胸にあるネックスの上に釘付けになる。{/n}「素晴らしい一品じゃないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ブラフはアービトレイターを無視し、彼の視線はメイヴに―具体的には、彼女の胸にあるネックスの上に釘付けになる。{/n}「素晴らしい一品じゃないか？」

languages.text: {n}Les yeux rivés sur Maive, ou plus précisément sur le collier qui ceint son cou, Bluff ignore complètement l'arbitrator.{/n} « Magnifique bijou, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux rivés sur Maive, ou plus précisément sur le collier qui ceint son cou, Bluff ignore complètement l'arbitrator.{/n} « Magnifique bijou, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}Bluff ignoriert den Arbitrator, sein Blick ist starr auf Maive gerichtet, genauer gesagt auf die Halskette auf ihrer Brust.{/n} "Ein wunderschönes Stück, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Bluff ignores the Arbitrator, his gaze fixed on Maive — more specifically, on the necklace on her chest.{/n} "A lovely piece, isn't it?"
